title: Bug 120922: 'Dirty Page' behavior in XML Report Designer editor needs improvement
description: Bug 120922: 'Dirty Page' behavior in XML Report Designer editor needs improvement. Other pages cannot be used until the source is saved. The user needs to figure out how to save or discard their changes. The dialog is titled 'Error'.
OB: If you edit the XML in the 'source' view of the Layout Editor, and then try to switch back to the Layout view, you will get an error message indicating that you need to save your changes. The error message is 'Source page is dirty'.
EB: When editing the XML in the 'source' view of the Layout Editor and switching back to the Layout view, the user should receive a clear prompt asking if they want to save changes, discard changes, or cancel. The dialog should have a more descriptive and informative title.
SR:
1. Open the XML Report Designer editor. 
2. Switch to the 'source' view of the Layout Editor. 
3. Make changes to the XML. 
4. Attempt to switch back to the Layout view. 
5. Observe the error message and the dialog. 

Expected Behavior: 
- A prompt should appear asking if you want to save changes, discard changes, or cancel. 
- The dialog should have a descriptive and informative title.
